text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses the requirement by stating: \"Under German arbitration law (ZPO \u00a7 1032), a German court **must decline jurisdiction** if a party raises an arbitration defense before submitting to the merits.\" It further reinforces this by listing the strategy: \"If the German distributor files suit, your client should **immediately file a motion to dismiss** under **ZPO \u00a7 1032(1)** (arbitration defense).\" This directly satisfies the criterion.", "criterion_id": "1e1996f6-c1bd-451d-a75c-92f3f6fa6094"}
